TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit AnnotationDocumentPaginator extends System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator
Public NotInheritable Class AnnotationDocumentPaginator Inherits DocumentPaginator

summary.span: 提供 以列印文件以及與其關聯的附註。

span.span: Provides a for printing a document together with its associated annotations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別會包裝指定至建構函式，將使用者註解新增至列印的頁面。The class wraps the specified to the constructor to add the user annotations to the pages for printing. ## Examples 下列範例會示範搭配類別。The following example shows use of the class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 依預設這個建構函式將文字流動方向設定為。By default this constructor sets the text flow direction to . 如果需要您可以使用其中一個替代建構函式多載，來設定文字設不同的設定。If needed you can use one of the alternate constructor overloads to set the text to a different setting. 類別會包裝指定至建構函式，將使用者註解新增至列印的頁面。The class wraps the specified to the constructor to add the user annotations to the pages for printing.

summary.span: 強制內容分頁、以新的總數更新 ，並將 設定為 。

span.span: Forces a pagination of the content, updates with the new total, and sets to .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 之後立即傳回，將`true`和屬性會反映總頁數。Immediately after returns, will be `true` and the property will reflect the total number of pages. 如果註解內容有修改，可能會變更的頁數或變更。The number of pages may change if the annotation content is modified or the is changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `userState`參數適用於搭配方法，如果想要取消非同步作業完成前的應用程式。The `userState` parameter is intended for use with method if the application wishes to cancel the asynchronous operation before completion.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property IsPageCountValid As Boolean
public: virtual property bool IsPageCountValid { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得值，這個值表示 是否為頁面總數。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether is the total number of pages.

value.span: 如果已完成分頁且 表示頁面總數則為 ，如果分頁正在處理中且 表示目前已格式化的頁面數量則為 。

span.span: if pagination is complete and represents the total number of pages; otherwise, if pagination is in process and represents the number of pages currently formatted.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 從可能切換`true`至`false`和重新計算，如果變更的內容或觸發重新編頁。 may switch from `true` to `false` and recomputed if a change to the content or triggers repagination.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property PageCount As Integer
public: virtual property int PageCount { int get(); };

summary.span: 取得值，這個值表示目前已格式化的頁面數量。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates the number of pages currently formatted.

value.span: 如果 為 則為附註頁面總數，如果 為 則為目前已格式化的頁面數目 (正在分頁中)。

span.span: If is , the total number of annotation pages; otherwise if is , the number of pages currently formatted (pagination in process).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可能會從不`true`至`false`和重新計算，如果變更的內容或觸發重新編頁。 may change from `true` to `false` and recomputed if a change to the content or triggers repagination.

summary.span: 取得或設定每個頁面的建議寬度和高度。

span.span: Gets or sets the suggested width and height of each page.

value.span: 用於格式化頁面的建議寬度和高度。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 取得或設定*建議*用於格式化頁面大小。 gets or sets the *suggested* size for formatting pages. 使用屬性來取得實際頁面大小 (如有必要的實際大小可能會從從建議)。Use the property to get the actual size of the page (if it is required the actual size may be cropped from the suggested ).
